text:
Saya menginap di hotel Platinum Balikpapan selama 8 hari pada akhir Bulan Oktober 2020. Yang paling saya sukai dari hotel ini adalah kamarnya yang modern dan cozy. Tempat tidurnya besar,empuk dan gak pelit bantal, AC nya dingin, penerangan di dalam kamar juga cukup jadi cocok buat tamu kalau mau ngerjakan tugas kantor selama perjalanan dinas. Kebetulan saya dpt kamar no.803 yang punya jendela ekstra lebar yang menghadap ke jalanan di pinggiran kota Balikpapan dan area sekitarnya, jadi kalau lagi sumpek melihat dokumen kantor yang menumpuk, saya cari selingan dengan menikmati pemandangan yang menarik. Kebetulan view dari kamar tempat saya menginap cukup untuk mengusir kebosanan, apalagi kalau pas pagi dan malam hari. 
Kamar mandinya juga terang dan bersih, wastafel dan kacanya lebar, airnya lumayan bersih, sabun selalu di refill dan air hangatnya selalu tersedia. Sayangnya pancuran atas di kamar mandi saya macet tapi gak masalah karena masih ada pancuran samping yang alirannya kuat. 
Selain itu di dalam kamar juga ada lemari es mini yang gak kaleng-kaleng jadi saya yang hobi minum es bisa minum air dingin tiap hari, air mineral juga selalu ditambah tiap hari walaupun yang lama belum habis. Jaringan WiFi baik di dalam kamar atau di area lain juga cukup stabil, jadi gak bikin nge-lag kalau mau main game.
Sarapan di hotel Platinum juga lumayan enak, dan ada egg corner nya di tempat sarapan, jadi tamu bisa pesan macam-macam olahan telur yang masih hangat buat sarapan. Saya paling suka croissant dan fla puding nya yang enak. Gelas buat minum jus juga gak terlalu kecil, jadi tamu bisa cukup minum waktu sarapan. Di dua hari terakhir saya menginap, sarapan diantar ke kamar, ada 3 pilihan menu Indonesian breakfast, American breakfast dan kalau gak salah Continental breakfast. Saya milih menu yang American breakfast buat 2 hari. Sayangnya di hari kedua kopi saya yang diantar ke kamar udah dingin. Dan kalau boleh kasih saran, tolong kentang dan sosisnya ditambah. Omelette dan sosisnya juga kurang seasonning jadinya kurang gurih, padahal dari penampilan, sarapan yang disajikan udah cukup cantik.
Semua kru hotel juga sopan dan sangat ramah termasuk pak satpamnya. Tiap ketemu pengunjung pasti disapa. Untuk itu terima kasih banyak untuk bantuan selama saya menginap.
Hal lain yg saya suka dari hotel ini adalah karena saya tiga kali dpt surprise dari hotel. Saya dua kali dpt coklat paraline dan sekali dpt cake paraline. Semuanya enak tapi saya lebih suka cake nya. Cake pandan dan black forest nya lembut dan manisnya pas, brownies nya juga cokelat nya terasa walaupun gak selembut dua cake lainnya.
Lobby dan lounge hotelnya luas dan sofa-sofa yg lebar dan cozy bikin tamu betah ngobrol santai disitu. Dekorasi nya juga artistik. Mungkin buat ke depannya sofa di lobby bisa ditambah supaya tamu hotel bisa punya lebih banyak tempat buat ngobrol atau menunggu tamu lain.
title: Menginap di Hotel Platinum Convention Center Balikpapan

text:
Sebelumnya saya seringkali menginap di hotel ini jika akan keluar kota. Saya tercatat frequent guest setiap booking hotel ini. Kami memilih karena bangunan hotel yg masih baru dan memang nyaman. 
Namun ternyata pengalaman buruk saya terjadi di sekitar bulan april lalu yg akhirnya membuat saya memutuskan utk tidak akan menginap lagi disini. Setelah jam checkout hari itu kami keluar dari hotel yg ternyata saya meninggalkan satu kunci hotel yg masih dlm bungkus card holdernya di meja dekat televisi. Sadar hal itu saat checkout di resepsionis yg saat itu jg tdk ramah, saya izin akan naik ke atas kembali utk mengambil. Namun ternyata tdk diizinkan dan diminta menunggu alasannya krn cleaning servicenya menuju ke kamar saya tsb buat cek. Ditelfon dari resepsionis tsb sy dengar dia bilang tidak ada kartu kunci kamar tertinggal disana. Suami yg masih tdk percaya memaksa naik ke atas yg akhirnya diantar salah satu petugas hotel. Dan akhirnya sampai disana.. ketemulah card holder yg sdh kosong tsb dibuang di tempat sampah kamar kami. Dgn kartu kunci yg tentu saja sdh hilang.
Bukan masalah kami harus dicharge utk mengganti kartu tsb. Tapi itikadnya staf CS dan resepsionis saat itu yg buat kami kecewa. Saya lupa nama resepsionis wanitanya yg jelas berambut pendek dan hanya senyum dingin dengan kami setelah kejadian itu.
Setelah kejadian itu tidak akan ada lagi kunjungan kami ke hotel ini. Sayang sekali hotel yg bagus tidak disertai manajemem sdm yg baik. Itu hanya kunci kamar yg tertinggal. Bagaimana kl seandainya barang berharga kami yg tertinggal disana???

owner_response.text:
Dear Rika puspita

Salam hangat dari Platinum Hotel & Convention Hall Balikpapan

Terima kasih yang tulus kami sampaikan atas kesempatan yang telah di berikan kepada kami dalam penyediaan service akomodasi hotel. Tak lupa kami sampaikan permintaan maaf yang sebesar - besarnya atas beberapa hal yang sempat terjadi selama anda menginap di hotel kami.
Dapat kami sampaikan disini bahwa kejadian yang anda alami adalah di bulan April 2017 yang lalu. Terkait dengan hal tersebut, sebenarnya tindakan telah kami ambil terhadap salah satu staff kami dengan ciri - ciri yang telah anda sampaikan. Karena selain anda ada beberapa tamu lain yang juga merasa kurang puas dengan pelayanan staff tersebut dengan ciri - ciri yang sama seperti yang telah anda sebutkan. Sebagai informasi, staff tersebut tidak lagi bergabung dengan kami sejak bulan Mei yang lalu. 
Untuk itu kami mengundang anda untuk dapat kembali menginap di Platinum Hotel Balikpapan dan mendapatkan kembali kenyamanan yang kami janjikan untuk anda


Hormat kami


Management

text:
Sebelumnya pernah menginap disini di awal opening hotel ini. karena kamarnya sharing jadi tidak terlalu bisa mereview semuanya.

kali ini menginap untuk liburan keluarga saya memilih kamar junior suite (executive) , kamarnya luas memang cocok untuk keluarga secara dekorasi dan pencahayaan juga cukup.

kamar mandi bersih dilengkapi dua pilihan yaitu standing shower dan bath up , dikamar mandi ini selain towel (handuk) sudah dilengkapi dengan bathrub (jubah mandi) juga.

suasana di lobby sangat nyaman karena dilengkapi dengan kids corner jadi apabila berkunjung kesini dan melakukan proses check-in dengan kondisi ramai anak anda dijamin tidak rewel.

resepsionisnya ramah dan pelayananya baik. produk knowlegde diterangkan secukupnya.

keamanan disini dijamin karena setiap menuju lantai kamar harus menggunakan kartu yang ada.

sarapan disini biasa saja tidak ada yang spesial tapi pelayanan semua orang di restaurant ini luar biasa. terutama pak tomo ( thanks for a big hospitality sir ) 

fasilitasnya lengkap dan free untuk tamu yang menginap. wifi nya lumayan cepat.

saya puas sekali dengan apa yang di hotel ini namun sangat disayangkan lokasinya yang jauh dari kota. 

pemandangan dari kamar tidak ada yang spesial.

semoga review bermanfaat untuk teman teman semua. saya sangat menyarankan anda untuk kesini karena hotel ini terbaik di balikpapan.

text:
Pertama kali saya menginap di platinum balikpapan, Penyambutan yang tidak diduga di Airport dimana saya dijemput secara private oleh pihak Hotel. meskipun harus sedikit menunggu di Lobby Hotel karena pihak FO tidak dapat menemukan reservasi saya tetapi OK-lah.

Kamar tempat menginap juga bersih dan rapi, saya mendapat kamar dengan view menghadap ke arah jalan Soekarno - Hatta sehingga bisa melihat pemandangan Balikpapan dari Kamar dan bagaimana keramian di lingkungan sekitar. desain interior kamar agak sedikit aneh dimana pintu kamar mandi dibuka dari kedua arah dan ada kaca transparan yang saya agak bingung fungsinya untuk apa. tetapi hal itu tertutupi dengan desain marble countertops untuk wastafelnya. 

Room service agak sedikit lambat tetapi masih dalam batas yang ditoleransi, fasilitas ruang fitness memadai, meskipun buka agak sedikit siang (pada hari pertama saya menghidupkan semua alatnya sendiri), kolam renang OK dan pelayanan di restoran juga sangat baik...

Overall hotel ini sangat baik untuk yang menginap dalam perjalanan bisnis tetapi kalau untuk liburan dan keluarga kurang direkomendasikan.

text:
Hotel bintang 4 yang baru buka di wilayah Balikpapan Utara ini sangat dekat dengan Mangrove Center, pelabuhan ferry kariangau, RSUD Kanodjoso dan tepat berada di jalan poros Balikpapan - Samarinda dan wilayah selatan kalimantan timur serta jarak dari bandara sekitar 30 menit dan ada fasilitas antar jemput free ke airport juga.
Untuk kamar cukup bagus dengan konsep minimalis dan warna yang ungu, saat itu saya menginap di kamar Deluxe, jika anda ingin menambahkan extrabed dikamar sebaiknya konsultasikan lagi ke pihak hotel karena untuk 2 tipe kamar Business dan Deluxe, space ruangannya tidak terlalu besar dan juga jika Anda membawa kendaraan pribadi mintalah Valley Parking, karena lokasi parkir yang sangat luas. 
kolam renangnya bagus (outdoor) dan saat itu untuk fitness dan spa masih dalam progress. restauran chiness nya enak dan breakfast menunya cukup variatif, Disemua area hotel dilengkapi dengan free wifi (mintalah password ke reception saat check in).
pelayanannya sangat ramah dan cepat, dan ingat jangan sampai menghilangkan kunci kamar anda, karena akan dikenakan add charge Rp 50.000/key.

text: Stayed at this hotel and was not disappointed, sumptuous breakfast with everything you could want nearly available ,very fine and high quality food too, lots of care and attention by the wait staff also which was pleasing...nice soft pillow top beds, marble bathrooms, great air conditioner, nice window in the room to let the light in...quiet rooms, nice pool and friendly staff....I like to stay here when visiting Balikpapan....just one word of warning though, make sure you don't cut yourself shaving and stain a towel or you will be up for the cost of getting it cleaned...(fair enough I guess but this is not told to you when visiting)....also make sure you pay a deposit otherwise the mini bar fridge will be locked and no explanation given unless you go and chase them and ask...this Hotel also provides a free airport shuttle which given it's not close to the airport is a great service which keeps me coming back...also friendly folk run this place which makes it very pleasant
title: Nice newish hotel with clean rooms great beds and awesome breakfast!

text:
We stayed at Room 705 for 3 nights as family. 

New accommodation, good price for almost excellent accommodation in Balikpapan (location is a bit far from town - though, they provide free shuttle to airport and mall). 
Favorable choices of breakfast.
Neat & new gym for free
Nice sauna for free.
Clean swimming pool - but close quite early, at 19.00.   :(
Live band at the evening at the cafe.
Water hoses, toilet flush, lights, aircon, work properly.
Spacey bathroom.
Free Wi-Fi in all areas (generous speed). 
Large parking lot.
Bugs free.
Smiley staffs.
I noticed the cleaner placed the new small towels at the spot where i last put them, which is thoughtful to replace but keep my preference.

Nothing much within walking distance. 
Next to a mosque, probably won't be helpful for those who need quieter stay, look for higher floor or room facing the main street instead.
Since it wasn't too crowded, or else. They only had 1 reception officer when we check out, so we got to queue, while rushing to catch the flight.
The bathroom's exhaust was somehow noisy. Keep the door closed to minimise the sound. 

Overall it was a pleasant stay. Hopefully they will be able to keep the quality.
title: Pleasant Stay

text:
In general the hotel was very good and in accordance with the four-star standard. The receptionist was very friendly in serving guests. The check in and checkout process was very fast because the staff in the front office have knew exactly what their discharge of duties. I booked a room through Traveloka.com and got a very moderate price that is Rp 400,000 for a deluxe room for my first night. On the way to the hotel I just decided to stay 3 nights so it should be booking for next 2 nights. At the time I booked a room with business type. This meant I had to move rooms on the 2nd day. After explaining that I was not comfortable to move rooms, they decided to give me the business room since my first night. The decision was very fast and fun for me as a guest. Cleanliness and room size was very good and I quite enjoyed my break at night. There are 4 unit lifts so I do not have to wait long in front of the lift. When I asked some information about tourist attractions in Balikpapan, receptionist kindly explain some interesting places. Wifi in the rooms is very good.
Security are good enough. Every car should be checked and in front of the entrance there is a scanning device. Unfortunately the road in front of the hotel include lines jammed so if you want to cross the road is quite troublesome. Meanwhile, the security guard at the entrance did not even care to help guests cross the road.
title: Reccomended Hotel

as the service city hotel industry has grow up so fast in balikpapan.
last december i visit balikpapan and stay for 2 night at Platinum hotel, i found this hotel by a friend recommendation and as my friend said this hotel has just operate and i think they in soft opening phase  
the hotel was a 4 star hotel and located at the balikpapan suburban area but as the city was not big its only take 15 minute to down town.
some of the hotel area still in progress and as usually in the soft opening phase they still try to find their rhythm in service and operation.
the room is good enough but there's a cleanliness issue i found in the bath room 
for breakfast they try to serve some complete menu but they only use menu from frozen food (such as dumpling) and they need to make a standard of food service
they price is good ( maybe they in soft opening promo) you have a 4 stars hotel as a 3 stars price.

text:
We stayed here just for a night to celebrate my husband's birthday only but the services were excellent. 
From the room, it's quite spacious, clean, complete with complete toiletries and bar complimentary (water in bottles, tea, coffee, sugar, general stuff), couple slippers and towels. 
We also had dinner in room last night. We ordered Sop Buntut and Fried Rice. It was nice, not that perfect as its not that hot when served but the taste is good.
The breakfast service was great too. They had various types of food from Indonesian to western.
The best was the hospitality of the staffs. 
From check in counter service, restaurant service, and even one of the staffs, ms Tasya was so helpful and kindly prepared my special request to give birthday surprise for my husband.
Overall, today was one of my best moments staying at Hotels in Balikpapan, especially with Platinum Hotel.
Thank you
title: Birthday Staycation plus Honeymoon

text:
My husband and I often travel to Balikpapan and Platinum Hotel is the best hotel we've ever stayed. And since then we never stay in other hotel in Balikpapan. We stayed in Junior suite, the size big enough, all looks tidy with a comfortable bed. The room very clean, spotless and same with the bathroom. When we come to the room the door still seal with the label say the room already clean and also use disinfectant, which in covid situation we really aware with health protocol. Even before you go in the lobby entrance guest going with disinfectant room. 
The environments in the hotel very warm, the staff always smile and friendly, front desk, bar and restaurant staff, they are great. And thanks for mba Lia, who always make room available for us and listen to us. And another thing what I really like with this hotel, they listen your voice, mean they not just only listen but they do something about that. Small thing like greeting card and some cake in the mini bar room are very sweet 😊. They also have quiet lots selection food for breakfast. So if you looking for hotel in Balikpapan, Platinum is the best choice.
title: The best hotel in Balikpapan

This is most probably the best Hotel in Balikapan. The rooms are spacious, very clean, extreme comfortable bed, and wonderful bath and shower. Super WiFi.
Nice pool and luxurious spa. The food in the Restaurant and Room Service is of high quality and tasty and not expensive. 
Breakfast buffet is very big and very tasty. All you can think of. 
But what makes this Hotel so extra special is the staff. They helped us with everything we had to take care of in Balikapan. This includes all staff, from front office to restaurant to room service to cleaning team. 1st come, we surprised with the portal gate, maybe bcoz its a little bit unsuitable for hotel. Usually hotel use the more modern style of portal gate.
Doorman and security so polite and helpful.
Welcoming by playground make my son sooo happy. They were waiting for me to check in without cranky.
Oh, yeah, we suppose to think this is a 5 star, when we look some of the corrosion handle inside the elevator. But it is forgiven since its a 4 star, hihi.
We spent 1 nite in this hotel with free voucher from a golf event. U know, so much t&c about pool usage for the voucher. Its not the 1st time our family got a free spent nite at the hotel. Event my daughter, who is a swimmer, didn't attract to the pool. But my hubby still use the pool for himself. He always swim to make his leg feel good. Me & son? No, we prefer play in the playground. text:
I choose Platinum hotel because it's high rating review. But my own experience unfortunately did not get the high rating like others.

i came to the hotel at 12:30 PM at noon. The receptionist told me that there was only one room left, double one. My booking was for two persons and i want twin. Then the receptionist offered twin room but i have to wait because the room was ready yet. I was then got my lunch, have walked the hotel surrounding shops.

it was 15:15 PM and i still didn't get my room. A very disappointing service. I understood that may be the hotel was busy due to big events in hotel. But the hotel should serve better .

The room was nice but i have problem with the bathroom. The unusual model of its door and wall make my and my friend were very uncomfortable because we still saw inside view of the bathroom. Ouch.

The positive thing is the breakfast. Breakfast menu were vary from traditional menu to Europe menu. The drinks were also delicious and we got tasty juice.

But having good breakfast was not enough to fulfill the bad impression since i came and the weird bathroom setting.

text:
First we were so excited spending our engagement 1st anniversary at this hotel (we are already married a year also for 1 year)
We checked in at 5 p.m. at the hotel. We ordered queen bed room with city view.
And yet the view was the roof of the swimming pool building.
For a while we didn't realize it. But then we felt it.
The room was so hot. The air conditioner was broken. 
We called the receptionist and house keeping, they said they would fix it with their engineer team.
Yuhuuu!!! We were there for almost 5 hours but the air conditioner still off.
SO DISAPPOINTED.
My husband and I can't sleep and enjoy our time together!
The hotel apologized and said the problem because of the black out of the electricity before broke the air conditioner system.
Their apologizing means nothing for me.
They didn't compensate.
Their service is beyond awful.
The breakfast was also standard.

I will never choose this hotel anymore in further.

P.S. We celebrated our 1st wedding anniversary (a week after) at Swissbelhotel Balikpapan Ocean Square which is so much better!
title: Poor Service, Not as Expectation

text:
We spent two nights here and it was a perfectly good experience though lacked the warmth of the other Balikpapan hotel we tried. 
 It is bright and quite smart but staff appear to be a bit unsure of themselves especially on reception where some speak little English. 
 It was a clean and bright hotel and breakfast was good. However it lacks homely touches and spaces are large but a bit mall like. 
 Typical was the swimming pool. A good big pool with plenty of space but a bit of a barren surround in term of plants etc. You also have to access it after a number of incorrect signs on other floors through the lobby, then a restaurant smoking area, down a service corridor and past a defunct restaurant aquarium area and air conditioning units. Unattractive and bizarre. Worse there is no shade and no umbrellas in the pool area rendering unusable in the heat of the day. 
 So lots to like but could be nicer with more experienced staff and some clever homely design touches is the large open areas.
title: Perfectly OK ....but.

text:
Das Hotel Platinum in Balikpapan ist ein sicheres, sauberes und ruhiges Hotel. Obwohl es nur wenige Minuten bis zum Zentrum sind, ist es nach Absprache mit dem Personal sogar möglich kostenlos dorthin gebracht und auch wieder abgeholt zu werden. Preislich ist das Hotel auch viel günstiger als vergleichbare Hotels. Das Frühstück ist reichhaltig und abwechslungsreich. Shuttle vom und zum Flughafen ist inklusive. Das Personal ist freundlich, nett und hilfsbereit. Besonders bei Frau Indah und ihren Mitarbeitern bedanke ich mich sehr für ihre bisherige Hilfsbereitschaft in Bezug auf unsere Familie und Freunde. Ich freue mich schon jetzt auf meinen nächsten Aufenthalt dort. Unsere Familie und Freunde mögen das Platinum Hotel in Balikpapan ebenfalls sehr. 
Viele liebe Grüße an Frau lndah und alle Hotelmitarbeiter.
title: Great hotel

Prezzo basso (speso 33 euro per la stanza). Unico neo la distanza dal seaport, volevamo andare a mangiare in un ristorante che ci avevano consigliato sul mare, ma il tassista ci ha detto che era ad una quarantina di minuti. Comunque il ristorante cinese “Canton” con il suo granchio ed altre specialità non ci ha delusi

text:
Nous avons passé 4 nuits dans cet excellent hôtel où nous avons profité de la piscine, du centre de remise en forme, sauna, hammam etc.
La chambre était grande et très confortable avec une salle d'eau magnifique.
Le staff n'a su que faire pour nous être agréable et parle un bon anglais.
Le +++++pour moi la gourmande : le buffet du petit déjeuner extraordinaire. 
Une formidable adresse à Balikpapan même s'il faut prendre un taxi (pas cher) pour rejoindre le centre.
J'oubliais : le restaurant de l'hôtel "Canton" sert sert une bonne cuisine chinoise.
